infos.value: So we're really headed east? To the rumored location of «Rubeus»?
...Yes.
I suppose we really aren't in the best shape right now...
I understand how you feel, Lord Mont. We can't afford to lose this battle.
Right.
If King Khury deems us unworthy, he'll kill Father.
And not only that...
He would likely take Schuzelt hostage to further his conquest of Hourne.
Seeking out «Rubeus» for help...
You know, we do have our pride to consider.
But if holding on to that pride does nothing more than cause others pain, I'll gladly throw it away.
...Right?
For our comrades.
For prosperity.
For Leonis.
Everyone...
I hope there's food waiting for us at the «Rubeus» hideout...
...You just had to ruin it by talking about food... Right when we all sounded so cool!
S-sorry...
All right you lot, prepare yourselves and let's be off!
